sentences.en: About a thousand students fought with riot police in the capital.
sentences.cn: 大约1,000名学生在首都与防暴警察发生了冲突。

sentences.en: As stock prices have dropped, so too has bank capital.
sentences.cn: 随着股价下跌，银行资本也减少了。

sentences.en: capital ‘B’
sentences.cn: 大写的B

sentences.en: capital investments
sentences.cn: 资本投资

sentences.en: During that time there have been repeated attempts to reintroduce capital punishment.
sentences.cn: 在那段时期不断有人试图恢复死刑。

sentences.en: His plan is to spread the capital between various building society accounts.
sentences.cn: 他打算把资金分散存到不同的购房互助会的账户上。

sentences.en: Reports from the capital, Lome, say troops are stationed on the streets.
sentences.cn: 来自首都洛美的报道称，部队驻扎在大街上。

sentences.en: Security tightened in the capital in readiness for the president's arrival.
sentences.cn: 首都加强了警备，准备迎接总统的到来。

sentences.en: she was ugly with a capital U.
sentences.cn: 她真是名副其实地丑。

sentences.en: The case of Harris has sharpened the debate over capital punishment.
sentences.cn: 哈里斯案激化了人们对死刑的争论。

sentences.en: The government is eager to attract foreign capital.
sentences.cn: 政府急切希望吸引外国资金。

sentences.en: The name and address are written in capitals.
sentences.cn: 姓名和地址都大写。

sentences.en: The President's unescorted vehicle was ambushed just outside the capital.
sentences.cn: 刚出首都，总统无人护卫的汽车就遭到了伏击。

sentences.en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentences.cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentences.en: The soldiers commandeered vehicles in the capital and occupied the television station.
sentences.cn: 士兵们征用首都的车辆，并且占领了电视台。

sentences.en: There are reports of widespread dis-content in the capital.
sentences.cn: 有报道称首都弥漫着不满的情绪。

sentences.en: There was a net outflow of about £50m in short-term capital.
sentences.cn: 短期资金净流出额大约为5,000万英镑。

sentences.en: They seriously believe that capital punishment is a deterrent.
sentences.cn: 他们真的相信死刑具有威慑作用。

sentences.en: trying to make political capital out of the weakness of his rival.
sentences.cn: 设法利用他对手弱点以谋求政治利益。

sentences.en: Washington D.C., the capital of the United States
sentences.cn: 美国首都华盛顿特区

sentences.en: What other home offers such a commanding view of the capital?
sentences.cn: 还有其他的房子能像这幢一样俯瞰首都吗？

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: 资本化；资本总额；用大写
用大写字母书写；投资于
使资本化；以大写字母写；估计…的价值

phrases.tran_cn: 资本性帐户；固定资产帐户
n. 社会资本（指交通、卫生、通信等基本设施）
真正地，名副其实地（用来强调问题中的某个词或概念）

trans.tran_en: a capital letter is one that is written or printed in its large form

trans.tran_cn: 首都，省会，中心，资本，(借款等)本金，大写字母，柱顶
trans.tran_en: an important city where the main government of a country, state etc is
